In M2:

Given code:



import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.Comparator;

public class TestKindRegistry {
	public class TestKind {
		public String getPrecededKindIds() {
			return null;
		}

		public String getId() {
			return null;
		}
	}

	public ArrayList getAllKinds() {
		ArrayList items = new ArrayList();

		Collections.sort(items, new Comparator() {
			public int compare(Object arg0, Object arg1) {
				TestKind kind0 = (TestKind) arg0;
				TestKind kind1 = (TestKind) arg1;

				if (precedes(kind0, kind1))
					return -1;
				if (precedes(kind1, kind0))
					return 1;
				return 0;
			}

			private boolean precedes(TestKind kind0, TestKind kind1) {
				// REF: move to kind0
				final String precededKindId = kind0.getPrecededKindIds();
				String[] ids = precededKindId.split(","); //$NON-NLS-1$
				for (int i = 0; i < ids.length; i++) {
					if (ids[i].equals(kind1.getId()))
						return true;
				}
				return false;
			}
		});

		return items;
	}
}
